text: Kumbarees is a Malayalam movie directed by Sagar Hari which was released in theaters on 23 August 2019. It stars Vijayakumar, Aswin Jose, Eldo Mathew, Ramesh Pisharody, Dharmajan Bolgatty, Shanu Bhutto, and Jenson Alapatt. ==Cast== * Vijayakumar as SI Pappan * Ramesh Pisharody as Psycho Ramu * Dharmajan Bolgatty * Indrans * Ambika Mohan * Mareena Michael Kurisingal * Tito Wilson as John * Shanu Bhutto * Eldho Mathew as Manu * Aswin Jose as Shambu * Jenson Alapatt as Anil * Binu Adimali * Ronna Joe as Meera * Andrea as Jincy * Ullas Pandalam ==Reception== Reader Aspect said of the film, "If you like mild thriller movie, this is the film for you." ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Malayalam-language films
title: Kumbarees
